about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to DRIFT MONKEYS?? If so, this just might be the game for you!

In Banana Blitz, chaos reigns as you and your online friends race as speedy monkeys in an action-packed competition to steal and claim the idol. In a world filled with crazy gadgets and unpredictable obstacles, reaching the goal isn't easy—especially when your friends are determined to stab you in the back! Equipped with explosive trip mines, freezing rays, and other wild power-ups, you'll have to sabotage your rivals while navigating courses full of twists, turns, hazards, and other animals out to get you.

What makes each race even more unpredictable are the random curse modifiers that affect every run—whether it’s suddenly having a massive head, being nearsighted, or dodging homing mushrooms, each modifier changes the race in surprising ways.

Banana Blitz is an exclusively online multiplayer running game where players must use their wits and reflexes to outrun, outsmart, and backstab their friends to be the first to reach the finish. Set traps, unleash chaos, and steal the idol at the last second as you battle for supremacy in thrilling, fast-paced races.

Key Features:

  • Online multiplayer: Compete against up to four of your friends in chaotic races to reach the idol.

  • Random curse modifiers: No two runs are the same as different combinations of curse modifiers create wild outcomes.

  • Use crazy items: Sabotage your rivals with pogo sticks, Minefields, and other fun gadgets.

  • Fast-paced, first-person action: Feel the speed and chaos as you dash, dodge, and jump through unpredictable levels.

  • Dynamic races: Only one player can hold the idol at a time—steal it before it’s too late!

  • Unpredictable outcomes: Every race is full of twists and surprises with explosions, item use, and unpredictable environments through a combination of hand crafted and procedurally generated levels.

  • Ultra wide support & playable with Xbox + PlayStation controllers!

Get ready for a frenzied, fun-filled race to the finish as you try to outmaneuver and out-sabotage your friends. Welcome to Banana Blitz!

name: Banana Blitz

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In this fast-paced, first-person online multiplayer runner, you and your friends race as monkeys to claim the idol. Use crazy gadgets like trip mines and freeze rays to sabotage rivals. Outsmart and outrun opponents in a chaotic scramble to reach the goal while the idol constantly changes hands!
